about_the_game:
The Pudding Pack includes 12 new game cards (3 rare, 4 uncommon, 5 common) designed by Orange Juice, and illustrated by Hono, Coffgirl, Ikuse, Miyazaki Shiyuri, Yulay Devlet, hexun and Yusaku Kagawa.

The pack contains:
  • 2 new Boost cards: Sweet Destroyer and Backdoor Trade
  • 3 new Battle cards: Sink or Swim, Serious Battle, and Portable Pudding
  • 2 new Trap cards: I Wanna See You and Encore
  • 3 new Event cards: Serene Hush, Unpaid Work, and Indiscriminate Fire Support
  • 2 new Gift cards: Lucky Charm and Metallic Monocoque

The cards of the set can be purchased from the in-game shop and used in both single and multiplayer. All cards in a multiplayer game can be used by all players via the center deck, even if they do not own the DLC.

  • 2 new Trap cards: I Wanna See You and Encore
  • 3 new Event cards: Serene Hush, Unpaid Work, and Indiscriminate Fire Support
  • 2 new Gift cards: Lucky Charm and Metallic Monocoque

The cards of the set can be purchased from the in-game shop and used in both single and multiplayer. All cards in a multiplayer game can be used by all players via the center deck, even if they do not own the DLC.
name: 100% Orange Juice - Pudding Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 2.0GHz or higher
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 8.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound compatible sound card

short_description: The Pudding Pack includes 12 new game cards (3 rare, 4 uncommon, 5 common) designed by Junpyon and Hono of Orange Juice, and illustrated by Hono, Coffgirl, Ikuse, Miyazaki Shiyuri, Yulay Devlet, hexun and Yusaku Kagawa.
supported_languages:
English, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Spanish - Spain, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support
